OP IS AN AND E: 
If you desperately need to steal something - you've come to the right place. In a city full of dangers, there is only one person who is able to perform the most complex order. In comparison, the cruel Baron Nortkrest pale and his greedy guardian, the mysterious Queen beggars ardent revolutionaries and street dwellers "bottom". His name is Garrett, and he has mastered the art of breaking and entering. Plague, war, fighting ... let the rest tremble - and he will steal! Imperishable classic returns. A brand new game from the studio Eidos-Montreal, given the fans an excellent Deus Ex: Human Revolution, revives the best traditions of the legendary series Thief. Can you become Master thief and survive on the dark streets of the city, where the blood on the streets - as common as gold coins in chests almighty Baron?

 Features repack:
Version of the game - v 1.1.0.0 
Do not cut / recoded 
Ability to select a combination of text and voice (text in the game settings, the sound in the installer) 

Additions: 
- The Forsaken - Challenge Map 
- The Bank Heist 
- Opportunist 
- Predator 
- Ghost
